summary: Two best friends are filming a comedy about getting revenge on the bullies at their high school. One of them isn't joking.
cast: Matt Johnson|Owen Williams|Padraig Singal|Ross Hill|Krista Madison|Shailene Garnett|Josh Boles|Brandon Wickens|Alireza Shojaei|Paul Daniel Ayotte|Jordan Foster|Sean Spiering|Michael Spiering|David Matheson|Jay McCarrol|Dan Fewings|Miranda Olesko|Kate MacDonald|Janelle Blanchard|Sara Camus|Alison Arnot|Andrew Carson|Aaron Feldman|Jacob Tsafatinos
title: The Dirties
